.
$$1+1 = 2$$
.

Ignore single dollar sign
.
It costs $5.
.
<p>It costs $5.</p>
.

Ignore multiple dollar signs in separate paragraphs
.
This costs $5.

That costs $10.
.
<p>This costs $5.</p>
<p>That costs $10.</p>
.
